DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate implantation rate intra-vaginal culture INVOcell device versus traditional IVF use minimal stimulation protocol
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Intra-vaginal Culture Embryos In-vitro Culture Embryos With Minimal Stimulation
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase IV , single center randomize controlled trial evaluate intra-vaginal culture use INVOcell versus traditional IVF use oral stimulation minimal gonadotropin stimulation protocol . The pilot aim include 40 woman randomize either intra-vaginal culture group ( N=20 ) use INVOcell traditional IVF group ( N=20 ) . Primary aim implantation rate , define number gestational sac see early pregnancy ultrasound divide number embryo transfer . Secondary aim : - Embryo quality , measure Gardner grade system . - Fertilization rate , define total number fertilize oocyte divide total number mature oocytes retrieve . This comparison take place day-3 , IVC embryo assess . - Clinical pregnancy rate , define number fetal pole heartbeat see ultrasound divide number embryo transfer . - Live birth rate , define number living baby deliver divide number transfer
DOC.criteria: Normal uterine cavity One year infertility Normal male partner semen analysis Age < 18 year old > 37 year old AFC < 8 Abnormal male partner semen analysis use donor sperm Vaginal inflammation genital ( vaginal , uterine , tubal ) infection Uncontrolled chronic disease ( uncontrolled diabetes hypertension ) Uterine anatomic abnormality Allergy plastic inability use diaphragm retention device Untreated hydrosalpinx Current alcohol abuse ( define > 14 drinks/week ) Prior history IVF cycle fertilization occur History recurrent pregnancy loss
